title: Do We Need This Tiny Pocket Camera In 2019?
description: Sponsored by The Vision Council. MrMobile's eyewear in this video: URock glasses from Modern Optical with lenses from Zeiss Group. For more information on digital eye strain, visit The Vision Council here:    [DJI OSMO POCKET REVIEW]  Fun fact: I started my first YouTube Channel with my Dad over a decade ago [ and for those first few years we built it mainly on the back of cameras like the Flip Video. In a world before quality smartphone cameras (and before Cisco came along to purchase and then discontinue the Flip product line) it was little camcorders like the Flip Video that helped wean people off videotapes and onto, well, YouTube. Flash forward to 2019 and DJI has blended the old Flip Video concept with the modern action camera (and a heaping helping of drone-derived gyro stabilization) to produce the DJI Osmo Pocket. It's an adorable and well-equipped little camcorder ... but in 2019, does anyone need it?   [SUBSCRIBE TO MRMOBILE]     [ABOUT THIS VIDEO]  MrMobile's DJI Osmo Pocket review was produced following over two months with a DJI Osmo Pocket device purchased by Mobile Nations. The device was used with a Pixel 3 and Huawei Mate 20 Pro, and received several software updates during the review period.
